sn1.19:4.2: Don’t you have a little nest?
sn1.19:5.2: Indeed I have no little nest.
sn1.19:6.1: “What do you think I call a little hut?
sn1.19:6.2: What do I call a little nest?
sn1.19:6.3: What do you think I call a network?
sn1.19:6.4: And what do I call a shackle?”
sn1.19:7.1: “You call a mother a little hut;
sn1.19:7.2: and a wife a little nest.
sn1.19:7.4: and you tell me craving’s a shackle.”
sn1.19:8.1: “It’s good you have no little hut!
sn1.19:8.2: It’s good you have no little nest!
sn1.19:8.3: It’s good you have no networks!
sn1.19:8.4: And good that you’re free from shackles.”
